text: Ok again struggling with tokens. I’m just using my regular  `PRIVATE_APP_ACCESS_TOKEN`  and refer to it on my serverless function it works on local development environment, then when I upload to Production i get an authentication error as in the screenshot, I tried adding it to the serverless.json secrets but that didn’t work as it is not supposed to be included since it is there by default… anyone has any ideas? :pray::skin-tone-3:
